Property.name: dbQuery
Property.value: SELECT npi, employer_identification_number, concat(trim(provider_first_name),' ',btrim(provider_middle_name||' '),' ',trim(provider_last_name)) as name, concat(trim(replace(provider_first_line_business_mailing_address,',',' ')),',', trim(replace(provider_second_line_business_mailing_address,',',' ')),',', trim(replace(provider_business_mailing_address_city_name,',',' ')), ',',trim(replace(provider_business_mailing_address_state_name,',',' ')),',',trim(replace(provider_business_mailing_address_postal_code,',',' '))) as business_mailing_address, provider_business_mailing_address_telephone_number as business_mailing_address_telephone_number, healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code_1 as healthcare_provider_taxonomy_code, provider_license_number_1 as license_number FROM nppes
